Message:
One day, there was a big landslide
in a village I happened upon.

More than half of the victims
were heavily wounded,
including the Knights who
had come to rescue them...

I can’t heal this many
people at once...!
The victims are already
at death’s door...

But if I use magic,
I can still save them...!

“With your magic,
even more people can be saved.”

As if scolding me for hesitating,
the words of my master floated
to the back of my mind.

I am a healer.
I came here to relieve
the pain of the people.
That’s why...!

I used my magic,
all with the intention
of saving those who
were suffering.

Thank goodness...
I saved them before
it was too late.

Everyone was staring at me
with fear in their eyes...

Ahh, just like how
I knew they would.

But, it doesn’t matter.
Doing nothing at all
would’ve felt much worse.
